00039 #include "dataMoveZgemm.h"
00040 #include "defZC66.h"
00041 
00042 // moving B-Hermitian from L2 to L1
00043 void dataMoveBHZgemm(doublecomplex * restrict dst, doublecomplex * restrict src, int k)
00044 {
00045   int kCnt;
00046   double * restrict ptrDst = (double *) dst;
00047   double * restrict ptrSrc = (double *) src;
00048   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrDst%8 == 0);
00049   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrSrc%8 == 0);
00050 
00051   for(kCnt=0; kCnt<k; kCnt++)
00052   {
00053         *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00054         *ptrDst++ = -(*ptrSrc++);
00055 
00056         ptrSrc += ((NPARTITION_Z-1)<<1);
00057   }
00058 }
00059 
00060 // moving B' from L2 to L1
00061 void dataMoveBTZgemm(doublecomplex * restrict dst, doublecomplex * restrict src, int k)
00062 {
00063   int kCnt;
00064   double * restrict ptrDst = (double *) dst;
00065   double * restrict ptrSrc = (double *) src;
00066   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrDst%8 == 0);
00067   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrSrc%8 == 0);
00068 
00069   for(kCnt=0; kCnt<k; kCnt++)
00070   {
00071         *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00072         *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00073 
00074         ptrSrc += ((NPARTITION_Z-1)<<1);
00075   }
00076 }
00077 
00078 // moving B from L2 to L1 (needs transpose)
00079 void dataMoveBZgemm(doublecomplex * restrict dst, doublecomplex * restrict src, int k)
00080 {
00081   int kCnt;
00082   double * restrict ptrDst = (double *) dst;
00083   double * restrict ptrSrc = (double *) src;
00084   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrDst%8 == 0);
00085   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrSrc%8 == 0);
00086 
00087   for(kCnt=0; kCnt<k; kCnt++)
00088   {
00089         *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00090         *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 // moving data from A to format needed for kernel
00095 void dataMoveAZgemm(doublecomplex * restrict dst, doublecomplex * restrict src, int m, int k, int mPartition)
00096 {
00097   int kCnt, mCnt;
00098   double * restrict ptrDst = (double *) dst;
00099   double * restrict ptrSrc = (double *) src;
00100   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrDst%8 == 0);
00101   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrSrc%8 == 0);
00102 
00103   for(mCnt=0;mCnt<m;mCnt++)
00104   {
00105         ptrDst  = ((double *) dst) + ((mCnt*KPARTITION_Z)<<1);
00106         ptrSrc  = ((double *) src) + (mCnt<<1);
00107     for(kCnt=0; kCnt<k; kCnt++)
00108     {
00109           *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00110           *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00111 
00112           ptrSrc += ((mPartition-1)<<1);
00113     }
00114   }
00115 }
00116 
00117 // moving data from A' to format needed for kernel
00118 void dataMoveATZgemm(doublecomplex * restrict dst, doublecomplex * restrict src, int m, int k, int kPartition)
00119 {
00120   int kCnt, mCnt;
00121   double * restrict ptrDst = (double *) dst;
00122   double * restrict ptrSrc = (double *) src;
00123   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrDst%8 == 0);
00124   _nassert((unsigned int) ptrSrc%8 == 0);
00125 
00126   for(mCnt=0;mCnt<m;mCnt++)
00127   {
00128         ptrDst  = ((double *) dst) + ((mCnt*KPARTITION_Z)<<1);
00129         ptrSrc  = ((double *) src) + ((mCnt*kPartition)<<1);
00130     for(kCnt=0; kCnt<k; kCnt++)
00131     {
00132           *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00133           *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00134     }
00135   }
00136 }
00137 
00138 // moving data from A-Hermitian to format needed for kernel
00139 void dataMoveAHZgemm(doublecomplex * restrict dst, doublecomplex * restrict src, int m, int k, int kPartition)
00140 {
00141           int kCnt, mCnt;
00142           double * restrict ptrDst = (double *) dst;
00143           double * restrict ptrSrc = (double *) src;
00144           _nassert((unsigned int) ptrDst%8 == 0);
00145           _nassert((unsigned int) ptrSrc%8 == 0);
00146 
00147           for(mCnt=0;mCnt<m;mCnt++)
00148           {
00149                 ptrDst  = ((double *) dst) + ((mCnt*KPARTITION_Z)<<1);
00150                 ptrSrc  = ((double *) src) + ((mCnt*kPartition)<<1);
00151             for(kCnt=0; kCnt<k; kCnt++)
00152             {
00153                   *ptrDst++ = (*ptrSrc++);
00154                   *ptrDst++ = -(*ptrSrc++);
00155             }
00156           }
00157 }
